IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: To establish, conduct, operate & maintain a non-profit academy of Law to provide non-degree educational opportunities of a post graduate nature for members of the legal profession.
IRS990.MissionDesc: To establish, conduct, operate & maintain a non-profit academy of Law to provide non-degree educational opportunities of a post graduate nature for members of the legal profession.
IRS990.Desc: To provide non-degree educational opportunities of a post graduate nature for members of the legal profession.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Organization's Forms 990, Return of Organization Exempt from Income Tax, for the years ending May 31, 2023, 2022, 2021 and 2020 are subject to examination by the IRS, generally for 3 years after they were filed. The Academy has concluded that there are no material uncertain tax liabilities to be recognized at this time.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The form 990 is presented to the board members and governing body during the board meeting. The return will be reviewed and approved by the board members and governing body before the return can be filed.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The conflict of interest will be reviewed and approved by the board members on an annual basis.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The governing documentation, policies and financial statements are available upon request.
